meanings.definition: Harmony or accordance in opinion or feeling.
meanings.sent1: The family reached an agreement on where to go for vacation.
meanings.sent2: The team came to an agreement on the best strategy to win the game.
meanings.sent3: The agreement among friends to watch a movie together was met with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The peaceful agreement between the two countries brought an end to the conflict.
meanings.sent5: The agreement between the musicians created a beautiful harmony in the music.

meanings.definition: A contract or settlement between parties.
meanings.sent1: The agreement between the buyer and seller was signed and sealed.
meanings.sent2: The legal agreement outlined the responsibilities of both parties clearly.
meanings.sent3: The agreement to share the last piece of cake was written in a fun contract.
meanings.sent4: The agreement between nations was like a binding promise for peace.
meanings.sent5: The agreement between the company and the employee was fair and just.

meanings.sent1: Their quick agreement on the decision saved a lot of time.
meanings.sent2: The agreement between friends to meet at the park was easily made.
meanings.sent3: The agreement to wear matching outfits to the party was a fun surprise.
meanings.sent4: The agreement in the courtroom brought closure to the case.
meanings.sent5: The agreement in the classroom made the teacher proud of the students.
